question: Which of the following is broadly grouped into two – the "black" or "dark" (Krishna) and the "white" or "bright" (Shukla)?
explanation: The Yajurveda is broadly classified into two – the "black" or "dark" (Krishna) Yajurveda and the "white" or "bright" (Shukla) Yajurveda. The black Yajurveda has survived in four recensions, while two recensions of white Yajurveda have survived into the modern times.
